sqlMap.select: SELECT CODE,NAME,BUNR,FIXLEVEL,KAKU,STZAIK,LEAD,KOUKI,HOJYUU,KURIAGE,WCODE,BUMO,VENDOR,HOKAN,LOTH,LOTS ,HIMOKU,FURYOU,TANI1,TANI2,DOFMRP,PKET,MAXZAIK,MINZAIK,STDCOUNT,EMACOUNT,ZAIKMIN,TEMPZAIKMIN ,NOKANRI,LEAD2,TANIKOUKI,KOUKI2,DOKOUTEI,PLURALBUMO,DONEXTBUMO,ISSIKYUU,HCTENKANRI,CHANGEKAKU ,FLATJYUN,LOTS2,MAXLOTH,MAXLOTS,LOTHT,LOTKIKAN,DOSEIBAN,DORIREKIOYA,DORIREKIKO,DOLOT,HIKIKU ,DOLOTBUNKATU,PCAPA,KENSA,TANKAH,SSUMPRICE,STUMIPRICE,GAKUJ,KANZANZ,KANZANP,KANZANZA,KANZANJ ,KANZANV,KANZANK,DFAKU,DFAKU2,DFJKU,DFJKU2,OYAK,CONT,INPUTDATE,LOT,WEIGHT,w,DCWEIGHT ,CLASSIFY_BUSINESS,PLACE,SUB_CLASSIFY,SUB_CLASSIFY_BUSINESS,LOT_QTY FROM XITEM WHERE BUNR IN ('FG','MATERIAL')
